subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, two months shy of her 18th birthday, won a slalom event in Croatia on Friday after picking up her first World Cup victory in December.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, two months shy of her 18th birthday, won a slalom event in Croatia on Friday after picking up her first World Cup victory in December.
